languages.text: "Я одна отправлюсь в палаты плазмадвигателя. Выслежу лжегероя и тех, кто ему служит. Подготовлю угодья для твоей охоты".
"I will go to the plasma drive chambers alone. I will track down the false champion and all who serve him. And I will prepare the grounds for your own hunt."
languages.original_text: "Я одна отправлюсь в палаты плазмадвигателя. Выслежу лжегероя и тех, кто ему служит. Подготовлю угодья для твоей охоты".

traits.locale_text: "I will go to the plasma drive chambers alone. Track down the false champion and those who serve him. Prepare the grounds for your hunt."
"I will go to the plasma drive chambers alone. Track down the false champion and those who serve him. Prepare the grounds for your hunt."
"I will go to the plasma drive chambers alone, while you will track down the false champion and all who serve him. Prepare the grounds for your hunt."
"I will go to the plasma drive chambers alone, while you will track down the false champion and all who serve him. Prepare the grounds for your hunt."
"I will go to the plasma drive chambers alone. I will track down the false champion and all who serve him. And I will prepare the grounds for your own hunt."
"I will go to the plasma drive chambers alone. I will track down the false champion and all who serve him. And I will prepare the grounds for your own hunt."

languages.text: "Ich werde alleine zu den Plasmatriebwerk-Kammern gehen. Ich werde den falschen Streiter aufspüren und alle, die ihm dienen. Und ich werde das Gebiet für Eure eigene Jagd vorbereiten."
languages.original_text: "I will go to the plasma drive chambers alone. I will track down the false champion and all who serve him. And I will prepare the grounds for your own hunt."

traits.locale_text: "Ich werde alleine zu den Plasmatriebwerk-Kammern gehen. Ich werde den falschen Streiter aufspüren und alle, die ihm dienen. Und ich werde das Gebiet für Eure eigene Jagd vorbereiten."

languages.text: «Iré por mi cuenta a las cámaras del motor de plasma. Localizaré al falso adalid y a todos los que le sirven. Y prepararé el terreno para que usted lleve a cabo su propia cacería».
languages.original_text: "I will go to the plasma drive chambers alone. I will track down the false champion and all who serve him. And I will prepare the grounds for your own hunt."

traits.locale_text: «Iré por mi cuenta a las cámaras del motor de plasma. Localizaré al falso adalid y a todos los que le sirven. Y prepararé el terreno para que usted lleve a cabo su propia cacería».

languages.text: 「私は、ひとりでプラズマドライブ室に行くわ。偽の王者と、その従者達を追い詰める。そして、あなたが狩りをするために、その場を準備するわ」
languages.original_text: "I will go to the plasma drive chambers alone. I will track down the false champion and all who serve him. And I will prepare the grounds for your own hunt."

traits.locale_text: 「私は、ひとりでプラズマドライブ室に行くわ。偽の王者と、その従者達を追い詰める。そして、あなたが狩りをするために、その場を準備するわ」

languages.text: “我打算一个人潜入等离子驱动室，找到那个虚假的勇士与所有追随他的人。至于属于你的狩猎，我会为你准备好狩猎场地。”
languages.original_text: "I will go to the plasma drive chambers alone. I will track down the false champion and all who serve him. And I will prepare the grounds for your own hunt."

traits.locale_text: “我打算一个人潜入等离子驱动室，找到那个虚假的勇士与所有追随他的人。至于属于你的狩猎，我会为你准备好狩猎场地。”

languages.text: « J'irai seule dans les salles des réacteurs à plasma. Je traquerai le faux champion ainsi que tous ceux qui le servent. Et je préparerai le terrain pour votre propre chasse. »
languages.original_text: "I will go to the plasma drive chambers alone. I will track down the false champion and all who serve him. And I will prepare the grounds for your own hunt."

traits.locale_text: « J'irai seule dans les salles des réacteurs à plasma. Je traquerai le faux champion ainsi que tous ceux qui le servent. Et je préparerai le terrain pour votre propre chasse. »

languages.text: "Plazma iticisi odalarına tek başıma gideceğim. Sahte müdafinin ve ona hizmet eden herkesin izini bulacağım. Sonra da senin avın için ortamı hazırlayacağım."
languages.original_text: "I will go to the plasma drive chambers alone. I will track down the false champion and all who serve him. And I will prepare the grounds for your own hunt."
